summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff implements multiple backend/frontend features (authorization, user profiles, level progress syncing, and new PWA install UI).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend authorization/access-control integration and permission-gated endpoints
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, yet new authorization logic and permission checks were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile storage and APIs (get/save caller profile; admin/self access rules)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend persistence of multiple level-state tracks (main event, promises kept, quiz) with save/get functions
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: New heart-shaped PWA install button and install help dialog flow
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend hooks to sync level progress with backend actor APIs (main/promises/quiz), including unlocking/reset calls
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to landing screen UI to include install button placement and updated styling/content
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which has no requirements).
